summary: Combination of mods, HD textures and ENB. Took me weeks to get all working right and the final result is beautiful.
descriptionHtml:
This is just an installation example of mods and textures to make the game look like in the pics. The ENB i used (and also needed) is here:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37978/?]Performance and Realistic ENB[/url]

And here is a vid with some stuff i recorded while playing.
[youtube]kTladJO0ljg[/youtube] 

[size=14][b][color=limegreen]Installation:[/color][/b][/size]

[size=4][b][color=olive]1-Texture mods (in this order):[/color][/b][/size]
-Skyrim HD - 2K Textures (all)
-Hectrol CAVES DELUXE HighRes Retex 4K
-Re-Defined Dungeons
-Benjamin318s Alternate Dirtcliffs Texture
-4K Alternative Rock and Mountains
-high realistic tundra moss - yellow variant
-Mushroom retexture pack Low res
-Shooting Stars
-Super Realistic Ore Textures
-TreesHD_Skyrim_variation_HIGH_NEW
-Vibrant Auroras
-Lush grass
-Ultimate HD Fire Effects

[size=4][b][color=olive]2-Mods (whit this load order):[/color][/b][/size]
-ClimatesOfTamriel.esm
-Lanterns Of Skyrim - All In One - Main.esm
-Solstheim Climate Overhaul.esm
-Chesko_Frostfall.esp
-Better Dynamic Snow.esp
-IceBreaker\'s Improved Reverb-v0.02-Cleaned.esp
-Improved Combat Sounds v2.2.esp
-SoundPropagationOverhaul.esp
-StaticMeshImprovementMod.esp
-83Willows_101BUGS_V4_LowRes.esp
-Birdsofskyrim.esp
-ImprovedFishBASIC.esp
-Immersive Battles.esp
-Immersive Brigands.esp
-Immersive Factions.esp
-Immersive Mercenaries.esp
-Immersive Patrols.esp
-Immersive Travelers.esp
-Lanterns Of Skyrim - All In One - Climates of Tamriel - lvl-4.esp
-Lanterns Of Skyrim - AIO - Dawnguard.esp
-ShootingStars.esp
-Skyrim Flora Overhaul.esp
-Footprints.esp
-WetandCold.esp
-SkyUI.esp
-Cloaks.esp
-Cloaks - Dawnguard.esp
-hothtrooper44_ArmorCompilation.esp
-DeadlyDragons.esp
-ERSO 03 - Slighty Mighty Dragons Unleveled.esp
-ERSO 03.1b - Slighty Mighty Dragonborn Addon.esp
-ERSO 04 - Mighty Odahviing.esp
-ERSO 04.2 - Mighty Durnehviir.esp
-ERSO 05 - Dovah Holy Book.esp
-ERSO 06 - Wait More Time Dragon Encounter x3.0.esp
-ERSO 07 - Mighty Dragon Priests.esp=1
-ERSO 09 - Vendor Trainer Quest-giver protected.esp
-SkyRe_Main.esp
-SkyRe_Combat.esp
-SkyRe_EncounterZones.esp
-SkyRe_EnemyScaling.esp
-SkyRe_StandingStones.esp
-SkyRe_Survivalism.esp
-Immersive Events.esp
-Radiance.esp
-SkyrimChimneysRW.esp
-Grass and Grass.esp
-Immersive Weapons.esp
-SFO - Expanded Diversity.esp
-SkyTEST-RealisticAnimals&Predators.esp
-EnhancedLightsandFX.esp
-ELFX - Dawnguard.esp
-ClimatesOfTamriel-Dawnguard-Patch.esp
-ClimatesOfTamriel-Dragonborn-Patch.esp
-ClimatesOfTamriel-VanillaNights-Lvl-3.esp
-dD - Realistic Ragdoll Force - Realistic.esp
-Apocalypse - The Spell Package.esp
-DeadlySpellImpacts.esp
-DeadlySpellImpacts - Two Fire.esp
-FNISspells.esp
-Duel - Combat Realism.esp
-ACE Realistic Fighting.esp
-The Dance of Death - Dawnguard Edition.esp
-ACE Archery.esp
-ACE Armor.esp
-ACE Enchanting.esp
-ACE Magic.esp
-ACE Melee.esp
-ACE Smithing.esp
-ACE Synergy.esp
-WATER.esp
-WATER Plants.esp
-WATER DB Waves.esp
-ASIS-Dependency.esp
-ASIS.esp
-SkyRe_EnemyAI.esp
-SummerSkyrim.esp
-BLEED.esp
-UltimateCombat.esp

About thet mods i skip companions/skins and so.
(im using 255 mods + the texture/body/sounds that dont use esp, so probably 300+ mods, 33gb skyrim).

Here are examples of how the game looks like with diferent settings:

[size=4][b][color=orange]Vanilla:[/color][/b][/size]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36141-1-1368820876.jpg[/img]
[size=4][b][color=orange]Vanilla + climates 3.0:[/color][/b][/size]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36141-2-1368820876.jpg[/img]
[size=4][b][color=orange]Climates 3.0 + ENB:[/color][/b][/size]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36141-3-1368820877.jpg[/img]
[size=4][b][color=orange]ENB + Textures + Climates 3.0:[/color][/b][/size]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36141-4-1368820877.jpg[/img]
[size=4][b][color=orange]ENB + Textures + Climates 3.1:[/color][/b][/size]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36141-5-1368820877.jpg[/img]
[size=4][b][color=orange]Whit all installed. After this point you can play with your brightness:[/color][/b][/size]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36141-1-1368820900.jpg[/img]

After installing all of the things i used [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13529/?]this tool[/url] to save memory. I optimized textures and BSA only.
I rarely have a CTD and my save game is probably full of sht since i tested many stuff without starting new game (15mb each save).

To avoid CTD i did this steps. 
1 Order mod with BOSS and then NMM if needed.
2 Tes5edit to check for errors. Then:
  - Apply filter for cleaning
  - Undelete and disable references (in all mods with errors)
  - Remove identical to master records (in all mods with errors)
3 Open Wrye bash and start BOSS with it. Then rebuild patch.
4 Order mods with NMM again if needed.

If the game freeze (also very rare) is because:
-running around and game simply freeze. I fix that by going other way and coming later.
-entering a cave/inn. I fix it by renaming texture folder to any name, load game, enter the cave/inn, save, rename back the texture folder and continue playing.

Plz suggestions and comments are greatly appreciated.
author: 32cm
